rn: New Game: Wayfarers of the South Tigris
Resolved bug not generating release notes.
Technical optimalization (removed deprecated functions, minify css & js).
Changed the application versioning to format: YY.MM.DD.build for better version understanding.
Added all necessary files to service worker, probably cause of a bug with constant application force update.
Changed games rules and setup pages into one game tips, not mandatory for adding new games to streamline onboarding of new games.
Split about application and release notes into two different pages.
Added new menu for user settings allowing to hide unwanted games.
Changed how new games are added.
Added new menu to the games, option to toggle between game rules, game setting and game options.
Added shuffling monsters for Roll Player's expansion - Minions and Monsters.
Added rules and game setup for Imperial Settlers: Empires of the North.
Added rules and game setup for Rising Sun.
Added rules and game setup for Roll Player (with Minions and Monsters included).
Added rules and game setup for The King's Guild.
Added rules and game setup for The Witcher Adventure Game.
Added rules and game setup for Tokaido (Crossroad, Matsuri expansions included).
Changed handling of release notes (json file) so there is no need to change info file.
Added "Search" function into the header for looking through the list of games
Imperial Settlers: Empires of the North
New Game: The Witcher Adventure Game
Added support to save game settings in localStorage for future use without selecting it again
Move "About" tooltip to separate page with release notes
Update splash screens with application logo

Fixed update message for app first time load
